name: Least Contender
description:
I forgot to mention in the controls screen that you can pause with esc or start.

This game was made in one week for Curdle Jam #10. The theme was "cream of the crop." I decided to make a game about finding the top seed in a gladiator-based society. The font I used for the menus is VCR OSD Mono.

It was originally intended to fight a boss if you won, but that was cut. So, just enjoy some AIs fighting.
